item.title: Social Media Content Creator and Manager - Upwork
item.description:
High-end yet relatable brand seeking to grow our social media presence with engaging, influencer-style content. We aim to build a friendly and appealing brand image.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and execute social media strategies to grow followers and engagement.
- Create visually appealing content (photos, videos, graphics, and posts).
- Manage social media accounts, schedule posts, and engage with our audience.
- Track social media trends

item.title: Creative and Eye-catching Jewelry Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video creator who can help us produce a creative and eye-catching video for our jewelry store. The video should showcase our beautiful jewelry pieces and captivate our target audience. The ideal candidate will have experience in video production, storytelling, and editing. They should be able to bring our brand to life through visual storytelling and create a video that reflects the elegance and uniqueness of our jewelry. This project requires a keen eye for detail and a strong understanding of our brand and target market. If you are passionate about creating visually stunning videos and have a knack for storytelling, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $7
Posted On: June 28, 2024 15:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Video Production, Photo Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Video Production, Photo Editing
Country: Ecuador

item.title: Talented Video Editor Needed for Animated Infographics and Social Media Content - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled and creative video editor to join our team remotly. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in creating animated infographics and editing videos specifically tailored for social media platforms. You will be responsible for producing high-quality, engaging content that aligns with our brand and effectively communicates our message.

Responsibilities:

    Create visually appealing animated infographics to simplify complex information.
    Edit and enhance video footage for social media platforms such as Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube.
    Incorporate graphics, special effects, and other visual elements to enhance video content.
    Ensure all video content is optimized for social media and adheres to the respective platform's guidelines.
    Collaborate with our marketing team to develop creative concepts and storyboards.
    Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines consistently.
    Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in video editing and social media.

Requirements:

    Proven experience as a video editor, with a portfolio showcasing animated infographics and social media content.
    Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
    Strong understanding of visual storytelling and design principles.
    Excellent attention to detail and ability to work independently.
    Good communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with a remote team.
    Ability to handle constructive feedback and make revisions accordingly.
    Familiarity with social media platforms and their specific video requirements.

Preferred Qualifications:

    Experience with motion graphics and animation.
    Knowledge of current social media trends and best practices.
    Basic understanding of marketing and branding principles.
    Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

To Apply:

Please submit your proposal with the following:

    A brief introduction about yourself and your relevant experience.
    A link to your portfolio showcasing your animated infographics and social media video content.
    Your availability and estimated turnaround time for typical projects.
    Your rate per hour or per project.


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 28, 2024 15:48 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Advertisement, Video Commercial, Social Media Website, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Advertisement, Video Commercial, Social Media Website, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Strategist - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative and analytical Social Media Strategist to join our dynamic marketing team, with a particular emphasis on skills relevant to video editing and YouTube content creation. As a Social Media Strategist, you will play a key role in enhancing our online presence and driving marketing and sales efforts through strategic social media management.

Responsibilities:

-Develop, implement, and manage our social media strategy with a focus on video content for platforms like YouTube.
-Create and curate compelling video content tailored for various social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, etc.).
-Monitor and analyze video content trends, audience engagement, and competitor activity to identify opportunities for growth.
-Collaborate closely with the marketing, content, and design teams to ensure cohesive video content campaigns aligned with our brand identity.
-Manage video production processes, including planning, shooting, editing, and publishing.
-Monitor and respond promptly to comments, messages, and inquiries across all social media platforms.
-Generate insightful reports on video content performance, audience engagement metrics, and ROI.

Requirements:

-Proven work experience as a Social Media Strategist or similar role with a strong focus on video editing and YouTube content creation.
-Excellent knowledge of social media platforms and their specific video content requirements.
-Hands-on experience in video content management, editing, and social media marketing.
-Strong analytical skills to interpret social media metrics and adjust strategies accordingly.
-Creative mindset with a passion for digital marketing and video storytelling.
-Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team environment.
-This role requires a strategic thinker who can leverage video editing skills to create impactful content across various social media channels, particularly YouTube, to drive engagement and meet business objectives effectively.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 15:42 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:LinkedIn, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Content Strategy, Facebook, Instagram, Content Creation
Skills: LinkedIn, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Content Strategy, Facebook, Instagram, Content Creation
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: tiktok video editior - Make a short form video more engaging (Gymshark) - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a tiktok video editior that can help make this more professional and with a great storyline .

this is the video...

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HUhxJF8rQWaAx8AlotZbtUdaneDxplqI/view?usp=drive_link


Title: "Fuel Your Workout with Gymshark x Protein Chocolate!"

Scene 1: Introduction (0-3 seconds)

Quick, energetic clips of people working out in Gymshark gear.
Text overlay: "Fuel Your Workout with Gymshark x Protein Chocolate!"
Scene 2: The Discovery (4-7 seconds)

Clip of someone browsing the Gymshark website, discovering the T-shirt and Protein Chocolate.
Text overlay: "We found the perfect pair on Gymshark..."
Scene 3: The Idea (8-12 seconds)

A brainstorming session with the team discussing the idea of creating a Protein Chocolate bar for Gymshark.
Text overlay: "We had an idea... Why not create a special Protein Chocolate bar?"
Scene 4: Production (13-17 seconds)

Clips of the production process: mixing ingredients, designing artwork, packaging the bars.
Text overlay: "From concept to creation... Job done!"
Scene 5: Product Reveal (18-21 seconds)

A close-up reveal of the final Protein Chocolate bar with Gymshark branding.
Text overlay: "Introducing the Gymshark Protein Chocolate bar! 19g of protein, 100% recyclable packaging."
Scene 6: Market Test (22-25 seconds)

Footage of the product at Gymshark Regent Street store.
Text overlay: "First stop: Gymshark Regent Street! Does it fit their market?"
Scene 7: Taste Test (26-29 seconds)

Clips of people at Pure Gym taste-testing the chocolate bar, giving thumbs up.
Text overlay: "Taste tests at Pure Gym: Delicious and nutritious!"
Scene 8: Photo Shoot (30-33 seconds)

Behind-the-scenes clips of a photo shoot with models wearing Gymshark apparel and holding the Protein Chocolate bar.
Text overlay: "Photo shoot time! Ready to present to Gymshark."
Scene 9: Mini Video Teaser (34-38 seconds)

A snippet from a mini video showing athletes training, wearing Gymshark gear, and eating the Protein Chocolate bar.
Text overlay: "Powered by GS Fuel. Gymshark Protein Chocolate – Fuel your workout!"
Scene 10: Call to Action (39-43 seconds)

A dynamic compilation of happy, energetic moments from all previous scenes.
Text overlay: "Join us! Fuel your fitness journey with Gymshark x Protein Chocolate. #FuelYourWorkout"
Scene 11: Closing (44-50 seconds)

Final clip of someone doing an intense workout and then enjoying a Protein Chocolate bar, ending with the Gymshark and Protein Chocolate logos.
Text overlay: "Let's make fitness delicious! @Gymshark @ProteinChocolate #Gymshark #ProteinChocolate #FitnessFuel"

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 28, 2024 15:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Intro and Transition Designer for Video Courses - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video intro designer to create captivating and professional video intros for our educational courses. As an experienced CNC Woodshop and small business owner, we are passionate about teaching other woodworkers the art of running their own business. The video intro will serve as a visual introduction to our courses and should reflect our expertise and dedication to the craft.
   
   Requirements:
   - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Strong creative and artistic skills to conceptualize and design visually appealing intros
   - Understanding of educational content creation and the ability to align the intro with our course objectives
   
We will need one video made for now and as we create more videos we will need more graphics made.

  If you have a keen eye for design, a passion for education, and the ability to create engaging video intros, we would love to hear from you. Join us in inspiring and empowering woodworkers around the world!

Hourly Range: $8.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 15:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Education, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Video Production, Branding
Skills: Education, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Video Production, Branding
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create Scene in After Effects and Finalize Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
I have a trailer video that is nearly complete and I need someone who can create a scene and tweak the existing video to help finalize the video.

Scope:
Create a Scene -
1) scene 8 (final scene before logo) - this scene is an animation i took from an anime movie. I need it replicated nearly identical so that we own the intellectual property to use it and there is no watermark

Other Video Edits -
2) final logo - final logo does not fit in the iphone screen dimensions, i need the video adjusted so the logo fully fits within the screen. Also, I don't know if its possible, but ideally the logo would be over a transparent background so whatever website the video is used on, it matches the background behind the phone
3) optimize for autoplay on website - is mp4 the best file format for this? What is the best bitrate/resolution? Do we need two versions (one for desktop/one for mobile?)
4) adjust scene 4 (scene with post it notes to reduce/eliminate camera shaking)
5) adjust scene 5 (scene with rocket and sparks) to add flashes to make it look like the rocket is gaining speed
6) adjust scene 6 (scene with astronaut riding rocket) to slow it down a little

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 28, 2024 15:26 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Trailer, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Trailer, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Edit videos in Descript - Upwork
item.description:
Looking to bring someone onto the team for consistent work through the rest of the year.  Your role will be to transform hour-long Discussion Group sessions recorded on Zoom into polished videos using Descript:  https://www.descript.com/download/other-device  

Payouts for each project are based on the number of words in the script.  I'll pay $1/150 words.

In addition to editing the video, you are also responsible for cleaning up the transcript to make sure it accurately reflects what is being said in the video.  You will also need to adjust capitalization to comply with the capitalization section of our company Style Guide:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1R9FtRJ48ccSe4IYOSs5uKYFGSZw3l7lOsHhDpaNPwYU/edit#heading=h.11ke499otym9

Ideal candidate is a quick learner with a strong grasp of English.  

Here are detailed instructions for the role (see :  https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePCDl_hvtdHch04ACX4DxlKRxW0wfu2p3NPlvpf05SM/edit

Here are examples of finished videos:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGd_Hl6NWLZfPu01s6FVfHBxf2rB2awG_

Thanks for your application!  I look forward to potentially working with you.

Budget: $45
Posted On: June 28, 2024 15:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
